alert.note: Alert for Elbert, Central and East Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet; North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 6:46PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Douglas and southwestern Arapahoe Counties through 730 PM MDT... At 645 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over northeastern Highlands Ranch, or 11 miles south of Denver, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Southwestern Denver, southwestern Aurora, Centennial, Highlands Ranch, Parker, Littleton, southwestern Englewood, Greenwood Village, Lone Tree, Castle Pines, Louviers and The Pinery. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare for sudden gusty winds. Secure loose objects and move to a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Elbert, Central and East Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet; North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County
